short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Audit your store, get an actionable SEO roadmap, and track results. Improve your organic rankings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Risify - Shopify SEO is a comprehensive and dedicated Google Chrome extension tailored specifically for Shopify merchants. This tool assists in optimizing Shopify stores for better visibility and higher search rankings.

Our extension provides a wide range of features to ensure your Shopify store's SEO health:

Meta Description Analyzer: Displays the meta descriptions of your Shopify store's pages to help you quickly view and evaluate your current SEO strategy.

1) SEO Errors Highlighter: Identifies and highlights common SEO errors within your store, allowing you to quickly address and correct any issues impacting your SEO performance.

2) Headline Inspector: Shows the structure of your headlines and subheadings, ensuring they're correctly optimized for search engine readability and ranking.

3) Open Graph Data: Provides an overview of the Open Graph data on your site, which helps enhance the look of your links on social media and boost engagement.

4) SEO Health Check: Performs an overall health check of your store's SEO, identifying areas of strength and opportunities for improvement.


With Risify - Shopify SEO, you can proactively improve your Shopify store's SEO performance, leading to increased traffic, higher search engine rankings, and ultimately, more sales. Equip yourself with the right tool to compete in the ever-changing e-commerce landscape.
